Package beans.HTMLparser

Class SimpleHTMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • beans.HTMLparser.SimpleHTMLParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkParser, java.lang.Runnable
    public class SimpleHTMLParser
extends java.lang.Thread
implements LinkParser
    This class is a simple implementation of LinkParser interface that Provides processing of HTML files. Extracts values of links from HTML files, collect it to list of Link objects and provide it to consumer. This class extends java Thread class. Instance of this class can be in separate thread to provide multithreaded processing
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Verbitsky Segey
    See Also:
    Link, LinkManager

    • Field Detail

      • link

        private Link link
        Stores Link object, that contains URL address. Parser uses URLDownloader implementation for download HTML page to file. File is analyzed with methods of StringUtil static class for extracting values of <a>Link</a> HTML tags and collecting it in list of Link objects.

      • linkManager

        private LinkManager linkManager
        Stores the link of LinkManager instance that consumes result list of List objects. The result list is provided to the LinkManager by calling LinkManager.addLinksToQueue method".

      • htmlDownloader

        private URLDownloader htmlDownloader
        Stores the link of URLDownloader instance. Used for download HTML page for parsing

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleHTMLParser

        public SimpleHTMLParser​(SimpleLinkManager linkManager,
                        Link link)
        Constructor of SimpleHTMLParser class
        Parameters:
        linkManager - - contains instance of LinkManager instance
        link - - contains Link object, that contains URL address for parsing

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Implementation of run method, that begin a parsing process. Before downloading a page, parser checks if the limit of processed pages has been reached. After downloading and parsing the page, it adds the found links to the queue for processing
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • parseLink

        public java.util.List<Link> parseLink​(java.io.File file,
                                      Link parentLink)
        Implementation of LinkParser interface method.
        Specified by:
        parseLink in interface LinkParser
        Parameters:
        file - - contains the link to file, that needs to be parsed
        parentLink - - contains the parent Link object. It used to define and set the depth of links was found
        Returns:
        list of Link objects, that was found while parsing parent URL address
